DATA CHANGED
Challenges provide a variety of resources and change every day.
Raids challenge your entire alliance to work cooperatively to complete a series of missions before time runs out.
Only VILLAIN characters can participate in the Villains Campaign.
BLASTERS and BRAWLERS deal heavy damage.
Each character has a combat role trait: PROTECTOR, BLASTER, BRAWLER, SUPPORT, and CONTROLLER.
Each character has an origin trait: BIO, SKILL, MYSTIC, TECH, and MUTANT.
A character's total power is a combination of their character level, gear, ability level, and Star Rank.
PROTECTORS use the Taunt effect and other abilities to draw the enemy's attacks.
Ultimus has conquered the Earths of countless dimensions and converted their heroes to build his army.
Characters gain ability energy in their Special and Ultimate abilities each turn.
Many abilities have an energy cost. Abilities gain a charge at the beginning of each turn.
Characters act in order according to their speed.
The Taunt effect forces enemies to target the character who is taunting.
Characters with the Stealth effect active cannot be the target of an enemy attack.
Area of Effect attacks impact the primary target and all enemies adjacent to it.
S.T.R.I.K.E. stands for the Special Tactical Reserve for Interdimensional Key Events.
S.T.R.I.K.E. is an elite division of S.H.I.E.L.D. that specializes in threats that arise from beyond our dimension.
Use S.H.I.E.L.D. training programs to level up your characters.
Collect all six pieces of gear to upgrade a character to the next gear tier.
Collect character shards to increase a character's Star Rank and gain greater power.
Characters with the PROTECTOR trait specialize in taking the brunt of the damage in order to protect their teammates.
Characters with the BRAWLER trait prefer to get up close and personal with their foes for maximum damage.
Characters with the BLASTER trait bombard enemies with damage at long range.
Characters with the SUPPORT trait assist their allies with healing and positive combat effects.
Characters with the CONTROLLER trait manipulate the battlefield by disrupting their foes and providing special benefits to their allies.
The Hand is an ancient shadow organization whose influence spans from the criminal underworld to global politics.
The Dark Watch is a mercenary outfit that operates outside the law and will take any job for the right price.
Hydra is a secretive organization bent on global domination.
A.I.M.(Advanced Idea Mechanics) is a multinational corporation dealing in cutting edge scientific research and development.
The Kree Empire is an advanced interstellar civilization with a powerful military.
The Ravagers are spacefaring pirates, thieves, and smugglers who live by a code: "Steal from everybody."
Ultron's automated factories are capable of manufacturing an entire army of his drones in mere days if left unchecked.
S.T.R.I.K.E.'s sensor stations are located around the world. They can detect a broad spectrum of interdimensional disturbances.
The Deathproof status effect prevents a character from being defeated when they are reduced to zero Health.
The Regeneration status effect heals the affected character at the beginning of their turn.
The Bleed status effect reduces the affected character's Health at the beginning of their turn.
The First Legion is an elite military force of Kree warriors who have sworn loyalty to Ultimus.
Ultimus uses the Conversion Device to corrupt the free will of heroes and force them to swear loyalty to his cause.
The Grandmaster seeks powerful gladiators. He offers great rewards to those who prove themselves in his arena.
Each character has an origin trait: BIO, SKILL, MYSTIC, TECH, and MUTANT. A character's origin defines what type of gear they require.
Many characters have an affiliation trait, such as AVENGER, DEFENDER, A.I.M., or HYDRA.
Earn three medals on a mission in order to unlock the ability to AUTO WIN and collect rewards automatically.
Assist attacks and Counterattacks are half as powerful as basic attacks.
Tap and hold effect icons to see detailed information.
Characters with the Stealth effect active may take actions without breaking the effect.
A thrown weapon chain ends if a target dodges.
A melee chain ends if a target counters.
